00052     typedef boost::uintmax_t doubledigit_t;
00053 
00059     typedef boost::uint_t<std::numeric_limits<doubledigit_t>::digits / 2>::fast
00060         digit_t;
00061 
00064     const size_t        bits_per_digit    = std::numeric_limits<digit_t>::digits;
00065     const digit_t       digit_hibit       = (digit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit-1));
00066     const doubledigit_t doubledigit_hibit = (doubledigit_t(1) << (bits_per_digit*2-1));
00067     const doubledigit_t digit_overflowbit = (doubledigit_t(1) << bits_per_digit);
00068     const digit_t       digit_mask        = digit_t(digit_overflowbit-1);

00080     struct base_random_generator {
00081         typedef unsigned int result_type;
00082         virtual result_type operator()()=0;
00083     };
00084 
00086     template <class T>
00087     struct random_generator: public base_random_generator {
00088         typedef boost::uniform_int<result_type> dist_t;
00089         typedef boost::variate_generator<T&, dist_t> gen_t;
00090         random_generator(T *g): genobj(g), gen(*g,
00091             dist_t((std::numeric_limits<result_type>::min)(),
00092                 (std::numeric_limits<result_type>::max)())) { }
00093         result_type operator()() { return gen(); }
00094         std::auto_ptr<T> genobj;
00095         gen_t gen;
00096     };
00097

00526 // Template function definitions

00541 template <typename T> integer::integer(const T& n,
00542     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type*,
00543     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_signed<T> >::type*)
00544 {
00545     if (n >= 0) {
00546         if (static_cast<T>(n & detail::digit_mask) == n)
00547             _init(detail::digit_t(n));
00548         else _init(boost::uintmax_t(n));
00549     } else if (n == (std::numeric_limits<T>::min)()) {
00550         // Have to treat the minimum number carefully, because -n is not
00551         // what you'd think it is.
00552         _init(boost::uintmax_t(-(n+1)));
00553         _set_negative(true);
00554         --(*this);
00555     } else {
00556         _init(boost::uintmax_t(-n));
00557         _set_negative(true);
00558     }
00559 }
00560 
00574 template <typename T> integer::integer(const T& n,
00575     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_integral<T> >::type*,
00576     typename boost::enable_if<boost::is_unsigned<T> >::type*)
00577 {
00578     if (static_cast<T>(n & detail::digit_mask) == n)
00579         _init(detail::digit_t(n));
00580     else _init(boost::uintmax_t(n));
00581 }
00582 
00593 template <typename T>
00594 T to(const integer& n) {
00595     n._throw_if_nan();
00596     if (n < (std::numeric_limits<T>::min)()
00597         || n > (std::numeric_limits<T>::max)())
00598             throw too_big("value out of range for requested conversion");
00599 
00600     T rval=0;
00601     size_t len=n._get_length();
00602     for (size_t x=0; x<len; ++x)
00603         rval=static_cast<T>((rval * detail::digit_overflowbit)
00604             + n._get_digit(len-x-1));
00605     if (n.sign() < 0) rval *= -1;
00606     return rval;
00607 }

00622 template <typename T>
00623 void set_random_generator(T *gen) {
00624     detail::random_generator<T> *obj=new detail::random_generator<T>(gen);
00625     detail::set_random_generator(obj);
00626 }

00630 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00631 inline std::basic_ostream<charT,traits>& operator<<(std::basic_ostream<charT,
00632     traits>& out, const xint::integer& n)
00633 {
00634     if (n.is_nan()) {
00635         out << detail::nan_text;
00636     } else {
00637         int base=((out.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 16
00638             : (out.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 8
00639             : 10);
00640         bool upperCase=(out.flags() & std::ios::uppercase ? true : false);
00641 
00642         if (out.flags() & std::ios::showbase) {
00643             if (n.sign() < 0) out << "-";
00644 
00645             if (base==16 && upperCase) out << "0X";
00646             else if (base==16) out << "0x";
00647             else if (base==8) out << "0";
00648 
00649             out << xint::to_string(abs(n), base, upperCase);
00650         } else {
00651             out << xint::to_string(n, base, upperCase);
00652         }
00653     }
00654     return out;
00655 }
00656 
00657 template <typename charT, typename traits>
00658 inline std::basic_istream<charT,traits>& operator>>(std::basic_istream<charT,
00659     traits>& in, xint::integer& n)
00660 {
00661     int hex=(in.flags() & std::ios::hex) ? 1 : 0;
00662     int dec=(in.flags() & std::ios::dec) ? 1 : 0;
00663     int oct=(in.flags() & std::ios::oct) ? 1 : 0;
00664     int count=hex+dec+oct;
00665 
00666     size_t base=autobase;
00667     if (count==1) {
00668         if (hex) base=16;
00669         else if (oct) base=8;
00670         else base=10;
00671     } else if (count>1) base=10;
00672     // else auto-base
00673 
00674     std::string s;
00675     if (in.peek()=='+') {
00676         in.ignore();
00677     } else if (in.peek()=='-') {
00678         in.ignore();
00679         s.push_back('-');
00680     }
00681 
00682     if (base==autobase) {
00683         if (in.peek()=='0') {
00684             in.ignore();
00685             int c=in.peek();
00686             if (c=='x' || c=='X') {
00687                 in.ignore();
00688                 base=16;
00689             } else base=8;
00690         } else base=10;
00691     }
00692 
00693     if (in.peek()=='#') {
00694         // Must be either #NaN# or an error
00695         char buffer[6];
00696         std::streamsize size=in.readsome(buffer, 5);
00697         buffer[size]=0;
00698         std::string str(buffer);
00699 
00700         if (str==detail::nan_text) n=integer(not_a_number());
00701         else in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
00702     } else {
00703         while (in) {
00704             int c=in.peek();
00705             if ((base==8 && (c>='0' && c<='7')) ||
00706                 (base==10 && (c>='0' && c<='9')) ||
00707                 (base==16 && ((c>='0' && c<='9') || (c>='a' && c<='f') ||
00708                     (c>='A' && c<='F'))))
00709             {
00710                 in.ignore();
00711                 s.push_back(char(c));
00712             } else break;
00713         }
00714 
00715         token allow=allow_exceptions();
00716         try {
00717             xint::integer testValue=xint::from_string(s, base);
00718             n=testValue;
00719         } catch (xint::invalid_digit&) {
00720             // Catch invalid strings
00721             in.setstate(std::ios::failbit);
00722         }
00723     }
00724 
00725     return in;
00726 }
